content.rendered:
STEDI 42mm Festoon LED Light Conversion Globe. Often found throughout a vehicle as licence plate & interior lighting.

DETAILS

You’ve upgraded all the exteriror lights to LED, but what about the interior? Our SJ-3014 LEDs are the way to go to take the dullness out of the cabin. Available in a range of sizes to suit most vehicles our SJ-3014 are sure to make all the difference.

KEY TECHNICAL FEATURES | SJ-3014 42MM

  • CANBUS friendly – Error free operation
  • Not Polarity Sensitive – our SJ-3014’s wont fail if you plug them in the wrong way.
  • Constant Current circuit – Avoids compromising LED life & provides consistent illumination across all LEDs
  • Compatible 12v circuits.
  • 18SMD LED for uniform light distribution

COMMON USES FOR FESTOON GLOBES

  • Interior Dome Lights
  • License Plate Lights
  • Boot Light

Sold in packs of 2

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED 3014
POWER 0.1a @ 13.6v
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v
LIFESPAN 30,000 Hours
CANBUS Built In
CONNECTOR TYPE SJ-3014
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c
CERTIFICATION CE, ROHS

 

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI SJ-3014 42MM LED Lights
  • User Instruction Manual

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 2 PACK FESTOON SJ-3014 42MM LED LIGHT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
